comments.author: theo@mozillafoundation.org
comments.text:
Created attachment 583483
Background is broken in many l10n, this is the "fr" example. We have already reduced the strings, but we have to increase the background height.

comments.author: theo@mozillafoundation.org
comments.text: I think we need at least 26px, the strings shouldn't need more lines than in this case.
comments.creator: theo@mozillafoundation.org
comments.raw_text: I think we need at least 26px, the strings shouldn't need more lines than in this case.
Martell, we probably want background images that are taller than necessary to ensure that we're safe in all locales, but I'm not sure exactly how tall that should be.
comments.text: Martell, we probably want background images that are taller than necessary to ensure that we're safe in all locales, but I'm not sure exactly how tall that should be.
